hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
. /home/jenkins/virtual_env/datawinners/bin/activate cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/Datawinners-develop/workspace/datawinners fab local deploy:mangrove_build_number=`curl http://localhost:8080/job/Mangrove-develop/lastSuccessfulBuild/buildNumber`,datawinner_build_number=`curl http://localhost:8080/job/DataWinners-develop/lastSuccessfulBuild/buildNumber`,home_dir="/home/mangrover",virtual_env="/home/mangrover/virtual_env/datawinners",environment="test",recreate_db="false" ps -ef|grep Xvfb |grep -v grep || Xvfb :99 -ac & export DISPLAY=":99" cd /home/mangrover/workspace/datawinners . /home/jenkins/virtual_env/datawinners/bin/activate cd func_tests
nosetests -v -a "smoke" --with-xunit --xunit-file=../xunit.xml
fab local stop_gunicorn cd .. git rev-parse origin/develop > /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/Datawinners-develop/workspace/last_successful_commit_sha_ft cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/Datawinners-develop/workspace/datawinners fab local killfirefox
